mapper.select: select a.apply_id, a.resume_id, a.jobs_id, r.title, j.position, r.career, r.education, u.name, u.birth from apply_tb a join jobs_tb j on a.jobs_id = j.jobs_id join resume_tb r on a.resume_id = r.resume_id join user_tb u on u.user_id = r.user_id where j.comp_id = #{compId}

select a.apply_id, a.resume_id, a.jobs_id, a.state, j.title jobs_title, r.title resume_title, j.position from apply_tb a join jobs_tb j on a.jobs_id = j.jobs_id join resume_tb r on a.resume_id = r.resume_id where r.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into apply_tb ( resume_id, jobs_id, state, created_at ) values ( #{aDto.resumeId}, #{aDto.jobsId}, 1, now() )
